derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English faucon (originally denoting any diurnal bird of prey used in falconry): from Old French, from late Latin falco, from Latin falx, falc- 'scythe', or of Germanic origin and related to Dutch valk and German Falke. The -l- was added in the 15th cent. to conform with the Latin spelling

encyclopedia.content: 乐队介绍 来自西安本土的摇滚乐队2006年组建，乐队共4人，队长吕谨言，节奏吉他吕佳，贝斯郑朴，鼓手徐豪。2009年刘斐加入乐队。经常在西安酒吧，琴行，酒店等地表演。2006年年底进军北京受到太合麦田鸟人艺术等唱片公司的接见，终因不愿为自己的理想和现实所妥协，而放弃签约。经典原创作品《冲破理想》《向往猎鹰》等。乐队于2010年由于队员自身生活等原因被迫解散。 队名含义 乐队之名“FALCON”是由其主唱吕谨言手所取，中文

entry.def: A falcon is a bird of prey that can be trained to hunt other birds and animals.

means.word_mean: 1. diurnal birds of prey having long pointed powerful wings adapted for swift flight

sentences.sentence: "The Arabs like to falcon in the desert"

sentences.en: Peregrine falcons usually pluck the feathers and strip the flesh off their bird prey.
sentences.cn: 游隼捕到鸟类猎物时，通常是先拔掉它们的羽毛，再把肉撕下来。
